General Usage Guideline: 5 - 7% (account for variances for flavor profiles)

Natural Occurring Citrus: Fruit Punch, Lemons, Limes, Grapefruit, Oranges etc: 1-3%

2 Week Steep

‚ñ∫Vape: Changes

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Watermelon Flesh folds under Rind flavor

\- Uses: As an accent Flavor to Stronger Watermelon Flesh\* flavors
